user_query: I want to know the open positions of a trader on Binance Futures. Can you fetch the positions for their encrypted UID and provide details like symbol, entry price, mark price, PNL, and ROE? Also, please include the leverage used for each position.

TaskList.description: Fetch the open positions for the trader using their encrypted UID.
Extract the relevant details from the fetched open positions such as symbol, entry price, mark price, PNL, ROE, and leverage.
